---
title: "STV @ Porirua City Council"
---

There were four STV elections for Porirua City Council in 2019.

## Mayor

One seat elected from six candidates in five iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374782957" width="640" height="358" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Eastern Ward

Four seats elected from seven candidates in six iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374782924" width="640" height="384" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Northern Ward

Four seats elected from eight candidates in five iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374782986" width="640" height="435" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Western Ward

Two seats elected from four candidates in two iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374783009" width="640" height="307" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
